name: Credit card insurance
shortDescription: Make sure your credit card is paid should anything happen to you.
longDescription: A credit card is a great way of getting money when you really need it. But, as a responsible family member, you need to make sure that you can still cover your monthly repayments should anything happen to you.
If you die, are retrenched, become disabled or if you are diagnosed with a dread disease, our credit card insurance can help to take care of the outstanding balance on your credit card.
salesHighlights: Your credit card debt will be taken care of if you no longer can, so your family won’t have to bear the financial burden.
It is quick and easy to apply, and no medical tests are required.
You can choose from different cover options.
salesHighlightsDetails: I use my credit card regularly.
I don’t want my family to worry about my credit card debt if anything happens to me.
